title: Valentines Day: Hariharan, Shaan, Kavita Krishnamurti revisit 90s love songs, say AI cant create that magic
description: Singer Kavita Krishnamurti, whose voice became synonymous with romance in the 90s, reflected on the timeless language of love songs back in the day.

title: Bharat Bodhan AI Conclave 2026 concludes with commitment to responsible AI in education
Expert Explains | ‘Using AI effectively for climate requires targeted systems, not just larger data centres’
description: Priya Donti, named one of the 100 most influential people in AI in 2025, speaks to Devansh Mittal ahead of the India AI Impact Summit about AI’s energy footprint, grid reliability, and how targeted AI systems can support climate goals

title: Global AI Impact Summit: India's Vision For Democratisation Of AI
description: (MENAFN - AsiaNet News) With New Delhi set to host the Global AI Impact Summit next week, India's vision for the future of technology is guided by a simple yet powerful idea: democratisation of AI. ...

title: Pony AI Inc. – Sponsored ADR (NASDAQ:PONY) Receives Average Rating of “Moderate Buy” from Brokerages
